1370: Bartrarde was born in Walker straet in 1370.
Got married to Marcibilia at age 20 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Marcibilia, Tetta, at age 20.
1371: Had a son with Marcibilia, Richolfus, at age 21.
1375: Had a daughter with Marcibilia, Soeten, at age 25.
Lost daughter Soeten when Soeten was 1 years old.
1378: Had a daughter with Marcibilia, Marisseis, at age 28.
1379: Had a son with Marcibilia, Jurre, at age 29.
1380: Had a son with Marcibilia, Lutbrandus, at age 30.
1382: Had a son with Marcibilia, Willem, at age 32.
Lost son Willem when Willem was 1 years old.
1383: Had a son with Marcibilia, Valken, at age 33.
1384: Had a daughter with Marcibilia, Suaneka, at age 34.
1390: Had a daughter with Marcibilia, Ryccie, at age 40.
1391: Lost daughter Tetta when Tetta was 22 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1392: Lost daughter Ryccie when Ryccie was 3 years old.
